Overview.Text: This is a HIT to choose which of the following is a cat

QuestionContent.Text: Which of the following is a feline?

Selection.SelectionIdentifier: The Year of the Cat by Al Stevens, Seventies Man
Selection.Text: The Year of the Cat by Al Stevens, Seventies Man

Selection.SelectionIdentifier: Leo DiCaprio because his name is Leo
Selection.Text: Leo DiCaprio because his name is Leo

Selection.SelectionIdentifier: None of the Above, they are all wrong
Selection.Text: None of the Above, they are all wrong
